snippet.title: Schrödinger’s Call 1st PV
snippet.description:
Mary, the protagonist, has lost all her memories. She finds herself in an unfamiliar dark room with only a phone and a notebook. The phone rings. After a conversation with "Wandering souls," a stranger appears on the other side of the line. A cat says, "If you save her, you will be saved too." Thus begins an emotional adventure using a phone and notebook.

Genre: A Last Phone Call Adventure 
Platforms: Steam® / Others
Release Date: 2025

■ 'Schrödinger's Call' Steam® page URL
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2090390/Schrodingers_Call/

■ Shueisha Games site
https://shueisha-games.com/en/games/schrodingers-call/

©Acrobatic Chirimenjako / SHUEISHA GAMES
